Is there a way or mod that allows you to change all the stock temperature readings (thermometer, part max temps) from Kelvin to degrees Celsius (or Fahrenheit if you're into that)? Thanks,

Benji13.

No,, but the calculations are pretty simple:

oC + 273= K

 oF = 1.8(oC)+ 32

You can derive the other equations from there.
